name: fla-csv-upload-tool
description: Internal web tool for uploading CSV files to Azure Blob Storage

scripts.kill: pkill -f "npm run dev" || true && pkill -f "vite" || true && pkill -f "node.*server.js" || true && pkill -f "node --watch" || true && pkill -f "concurrently" || true
scripts.kill:ports: lsof -ti:5173 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true && lsof -ti:3000 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.restart: npm run kill && npm run kill:ports && sleep 2 && npm run start
